sections.title: Common Tools
sections.description: These are some of the tools used in the world of cybersecurity.

fields.name: Common Jobs
fields.value:
- Penetration Tester
- Secure Software Engineer
- Systems/Network Administrator
- Chief Information Security Officer

sections.title: Learning Tools
sections.description: Here are some websites and tools you can use to learn the basics of cyber security

fields.name: OverTheWire Bandit
fields.value: This "wargame" is designed to help you learn the Linux command line. It starts from basics like reading files and navigating directories and leads to more advanced topics such as using SSL. https://overthewire.org/wargames/bandit/

fields.name: HackTheBox
fields.value: This site hosts machines designed for you to hack into. The main goal is for users to learn about penetration testing techniques in a legal way
